title: MOProgress
author: MOProgress
created_time: June 20, 2023, 06:39:25 AMLast edit: June 20, 2023, 08:17:30 PM by MOProgress
content: ★ WEBSITE ★ TELEGRAM ★ TWITTER ★ FACEBOOK ★ YOUTUBE ★ REDDIT ★Helpful Information About the Zionie Project ★ THE ZIONIE PROJECT ★ WHAT IS ZIONIE? ★ HOW IT WORKS ★ HOW TO EARN COINS ★ ★ SIGN UP ____________________________________________1. This is the 1ST ROUND of the Entire bounty rounds 2. 50,000,000 ZC tokens equivalent to $50,000 USDT are meant for this bounty round and to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst qualified participants.3. The bounty program is launched on June 19th, 2023 and will run until July 10th, 2023.The distribution will be at the entire bounty rounds. Be sure to read about the project at the official website______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. Kind regards.______________________1. All participants must Create an account on Zionie official WEBSITE2. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program3. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to request KYC for suspicious cases.4. Any inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.5. You cannot change wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.6. The only Wallet Address permitted is Use only BSC or Ethereum Wallet7. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.9. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.NOTE: Any campaign that does not have upto 200 participants, such bounty stake will be reduced and the participants will be rewarded for their activities Except Article that requires at least 50 participantsProof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONZionie Username:Forum Username:Forum Profile Link:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Zionie Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …Twitter               20%Telegram           20%Article                20%Facebook      20%Reddit         20%Note:  Your tokens will be doubled if you earn up to 50% of the coins in this campaign on the ZIONIE platform before distribution. What this means is; if you earn 10,000 tokens in this campaign, and in the Zionie Platform you were able to earn 5,000 tokens for your activities before the distribution, You will be given 20,000 tokens for this campaign.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (19.06-26.06)Week 2 (27.06 – 03.07)Week 3 (03.07 - 10.07) MASTER SPREADSHEETRewards:  1. Have more than 1000 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 4000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 7000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow The $ZIONIE Facebook Page.2. Every participant must join The $ZIONIE Facebook Group.3. Facebook accounts must have a minimum of 1000 followers.4. Participants have to make new Posts or share 5 posts per week (maximum 1 post/day).5. Participants must use #Zionie #EarnMoney #EarnOnline@zionieofficial in every post.6. Participants must not post anything that is outside Zionie on the group. If you do, you will be barn from the bounty campaign.How to join:1. Sign up on Zionie Website and follow on Facebook.2. Fill the registration form: FACEBOOK FORMRewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Every participant must follow The $ZIONIE Twitter Page.3. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.4. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).5. Participants must use #Zionie #EarnMoney #EarnOnline@zionieofficial in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Sign up on Zionie Website and follow on Twitter.2. Fill the registration TWITTER FORMRewards:  1. 20 Karma Points: 1 Stakes/week2. 100 Karma Points: 2 stakes/week3. 500 Karma Points: 3 Stakes4. 1,000 Karma Points: 4 Stakes5. 5,000 Karma Points: 6 Stakes6. 10,000+ Karma Points: 8 StakesPLEASE NOTE: Post Reactions will also determine the stakes.Rules:  1. Every Participant must Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Every participant must join The $ZIONIE Reddit Community.3. Reddit accounts must be at least 3 months old and have over 10 posts recorded already4. Participants have to crosspost 2 posts of the Zionie Reddit Community to a reputable community and 3 personal posts weekly (maximum 1 post/day).5. Participants must use #Zionie #EarnMoney #EarnOnline and a link to zionie website in their personal posts.6. To earn more rewards, participants should only make posts that are related to Zionie’s project7. Posting in off-topic will reduce your rewardHow to join:1. Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Fill the registration REDDIT FORMRewards:  1. High quality posts: 4 Stakes/week2. Medium quality posts: 2 stakes/weekWe will consider post reactions to determine the stakes.Rules:  1. Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Every participant must join The $ZIONIE Telegram Channel.3. Make at least 5 posts weekly (maximum 1/day)4. Participants must use #Zionie #EarnMoney #EarnOnline and a link to zionie website in their personal posts.5. You must not post in off topic and the posts must be meaningful in line with what zionie project is all about.How to join:1. Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Fill the registration TELEGRAM FORMRewards:  High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Sign up on Zionie Website 2. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website or ANN thread, will not receive rewards3. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.4. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.5. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.6. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, rewards,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, How it works, etc.7. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.8. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to About the project,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram channel, YouTube channel, Facebook Group, Reddit Community, or any other social media.9. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!10. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.11. You can only submit 1 articleHow to join:1. Sign up on Zionie Website3. Fill the registration ARTICLE FORMNote: Article submission will be closed 5 days before the end of the bounty.FOR ANY ISSUE ABOUT THIS BOUNTY, CONTACT MOPROGRESSBounty Thread Designed by MOPROGRESS
